content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to the current inventory and supply chain management techniques of Boxed. However, in general, some techniques that companies use to ensure that their products are always in stock and ready to ship include demand forecasting, inventory optimization, supplier relationship management, and effective logistics management. These techniques involve analyzing historical sales data, forecasting future demand, maintaining optimal inventory levels, establishing strong relationships with suppliers, and using efficient logistics processes to ensure timely delivery of products. Additionally, advanced technologies such as AI and machine learning can be used to further improve supply chain efficiency and accuracy.
